an3.44:1.3: Yo dhammaṁ deseti so atthappaṭisaṁvedī ca hoti dhammappaṭisaṁvedī ca.
an3.44:1.4: Yo dhammaṁ suṇāti so atthappaṭisaṁvedī ca hoti dhammappaṭisaṁvedī ca.
an3.44:1.5: Yo ceva dhammaṁ deseti yo ca dhammaṁ suṇāti ubho atthappaṭisaṁvedino ca honti dhammappaṭisaṁvedino ca.
an3.44:1.6: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi ṭhānehi kathā pavattinī hotī”ti.
